About Me

I am an aspiring Data Scientist and Machine Learning enthusiast, currently pursuing a Master’s in Data Science at the University of Maryland. With a strong foundation in machine learning, statistical modeling, and big data systems, I am passionate about solving complex problems and driving impactful decisions through data.

My professional experience includes working as a Data Scientist at Optum Global Solutions , where I implemented machine learning models and automated data extraction workflows, reducing processing time by 40% and increasing throughput by 32%. Additionally, I developed PaaS modules leveraging NLP techniques and patented an image similarity model for templated form processing.

My technical expertise includes Python, SQL, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, Keras, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure. I am particularly skilled in deploying scalable solutions and managing complex datasets to derive actionable insights.

Previously, I have worked on projects such as OCR-based text matching, automated document structure analysis, and semantic data extraction. I also hold a Bachelor’s in Computer Science from Vellore Institute of Technology and was honored with awards like SIH 2019 for Customer Support Automation.

My goal is to apply my skills to projects that contribute to meaningful change, whether by optimizing business processes, enhancing user experiences, or improving access to critical information. I thrive in environments that encourage innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.

Professional experience

March 2023 - June 2024
1 year 4 months

Data Scientist, Optum Global Solutions

Developed and deployed machine learning models for automated data extraction and templated form processing, achieving a 40% reduction in processing time and a 32% increase in throughput. Patented an image similarity model for enhanced form processing accuracy. Leveraged NLP techniques such as semantic analysis, table extraction, and edge detection to deliver modular services. Achieved a 96% accuracy rate and 42% faster processing for non-templated document matching using MPNet transformers.

July 2021 - March 2023
1 year 9 months

Associate Software Engineer II, Optum Global Solutions

Designed and implemented OCR-based text matching and edge data extraction modules with validation and auto-correction. Optimized code efficiency, reducing processing time from 1 minute to 30 seconds and increasing system capacity from 5 to 24 files per minute through concurrency and load balancing. Integrated a Layout Parser, achieving 87% accuracy on Doclaynet for document structure analysis.
